channel.title: General Hacking Sad Servers Firewall Colocation on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Hacking Sad Servers Firewall Colocation on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: horrible things...
item.description: Man today sucked. Seriously. I haven’t had a BAD day in years. today. today was a bad day. I woke up and got in the shower. Got dressed. check my email. checked my text messages. and i had a txt from my buddy mike telling me my server was broke. so i checked it out. i couldn’t ssh into it or anything - which is very very unusual. I have never been able to not connect at all.
